Message: The user completes the submission of the form
How to give account access to other email id

Sure, I can help with that! To grant access to new users for your organization or ad account, follow these steps:
1. Go to Account Management.
2. Click 'Access' under your preferred Organization or Ad account.
3. Select 'Add User' on the right-hand side of your screen.
4. Fill in the email address of the new user and their role (Admin, Employee, Operator, or Viewer) and submit.
The new user will receive an email prompting them to make an account and verify their email. After verification, they will see your Organization or Ad account listed under their own Account Management tab.
For more detailed instructions, you can refer to this guide: [Account Management Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17539290349709-Account-Management-Guide).

Okay, Let's start fresh! What can I help you with?
Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?

To create a postback, you'll need to follow specific integration steps based on the platform you're using. Could you please let me know which tracking platform or service you are using for the postback? This will help me provide more detailed instructions.

Great! For your tracking issues with Voluum, here is the KB article that shows how to integrate with Voluum: [How to integrate a general NewsBreak Postback](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25226963388813-How-to-integrate-a-general-NewsBreak-Postback). This guide will walk you through the steps needed to set up your postback.
